alert.note: Alert for East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 2:20PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 315 PM MST... At 220 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tumbleweed Park, or near Sun Lakes. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Gilbert, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, Chandler Heights, Gilbert City Hall, Tumbleweed Park, Chandler City Hall, San Tan Village Mall, San Tan Valley, Seville, Chandler Fashion Center Mall, San Tan Mountain Park, Santan and Higley. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 166 and 174. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 149 and 168. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 40 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
